C

CELLSIZE - Static variable in class WizardTD.App
 
checkDead() - Method in class WizardTD.Enemy
Returns true if health is 0, if health is 0, die() function is run and return true.
checkEnemyInRange() - Method in class WizardTD.Tower
Checks whether enemy is in range by calculating the enemy x and y position distance from the tower and comparing against the range, if in range, create a fireball object and add to arraylist of fireballs.
checkffed() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Checks the ffed variable if true or not, if true, calls the ff function in both tower and enemy lists.
checkHit() - Method in class WizardTD.Fireball
Calls reachTarget() function, if true, causes enemy to take dmg according to the fireball dmg multiplied by the enemy armor, obtained using Enemy class getArmour() function.
checkL() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Checks whether player has lost by checking if mana is 0.
checkPaused() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Checks the paused variable if true or not, if true, calls the pause function in both tower and enemy lists.
checkReachHouse() - Method in class WizardTD.Enemy
Checks if current x and y positions are equal to the end tile x and y positions.
checkW() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Checks whether player has won by checking if all enemies are dead.
circle(float, float, float) - Method in class WizardTD.Tower
Draws the circles for the upgrades on the tower.
configPath - Variable in class WizardTD.App
 
count - Variable in class WizardTD.Enemy
 

D

dead - Variable in class WizardTD.Enemy
 
decrease(float) - Method in class WizardTD.Mana
Decreases the current amount depending on the float value passed.
die() - Method in class WizardTD.Enemy
Updates the sprite image every 4 frames to display the death animation.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Button
Checks if the button is pressed, if true, the button is displayed as the highlighted version instead using the highlighted() function.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Enemy
Displays the enemy if health is not equal to 0.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Fireball
Displays the fireball image at its x and y positions as long as the enemy it is tracking is not dead by checking using the isDead() function in the Enemy class.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Mana
Displays mana bar using 2 rectangles on top of each other, scaled using current amount / maximum amount.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Text
Displays the wave number and countdown, and countdown is decreased by 1/60 every frame so every second shows a decrease of 1.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Tile
Displays the tile object at its x and y positions, multiplying x by 32 and y by 32 then adding 40 to adjust it to the correct position as each is 32 pixels long and wide.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Tower
Displays the tower using x and y positions.
display() - Method in class WizardTD.Wizard
Different display method as wizard house needs to be slightly adjusted to make sure it is centered.
draw() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Draw all elements in the game by current frame.
drawButtons() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Iterates through buttons arraylist of type Button and displays on the screen using display() function of the button.
drawHealth() - Method in class WizardTD.Enemy
Draws 2 health bars on top of the enemy sprite to indicate health bar, health mar scales depending on the current health / maximum health.
drawMap() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Iterates through the Tile arraylist tiles and loads all the tiles except wizard's image onto the screen using the tiles x and y attributes.
drawUpgrades() - Method in class WizardTD.Tower
Checks amount of upgrades of range, speed, damage.
drawWizard() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Iterates through the Tile arraylist tiles and loads only the wizard image onto the screen using the tiles x and y attributes.

end - Variable in class WizardTD.Enemy
 
endText() - Method in class WizardTD.App
Checks the checkL() and checkW() functions, if any are true, game pauses and the appropriate text is displayed.

enemyDisplay() - Method in class WizardTD.App
